publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-922 Alex Johnstone on behalf of the Rural Affairs Committee: Borders Railâ€”That the Parliament recognises and endorses the case for the establishment of a railway linking the Scottish Borders to the national network at Edinburgh and Carlisle and urges the Scottish Executive to consult with the Strategic Rail Authority and others to facilitate its establishment.
S1M-922 Borders Rail (lodged on 30 May 2000) Dr Elaine Murray*, Tommy Sheridan*
